inclusion.criterion: diagnosed with IBS at least 6 months prior to diagnosis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: IBS symptoms onset at least 3 days per month in the past 3 months
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: normal results from a flexible sigmoidoscopy, colonoscopy, or barium enema within 2 years of randomization visit
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: biochemical or structural abnormality of the digestive tract
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: concurrent illness or disability that may affect interpretation of clinical efficacy and/or safety data
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a recent history of aspiration pneumonia, is febrile, tachycardic, and hypotensive. The stool samples were positive for Clostridium difficile toxin.
